channel.title: Tele Delay?
channel.description: I am trying to add the ancient tele gfx to all my ancient teles, I got them all added but my problem is that, when they click the tele they just teleport right away, it doesn't wait for the gfx to finish. Is there anyway I can make it so it delays the tele 1 or 2 seconds after they click the button?

item.title: Tele Delay?
item.dc:creator: @Zach_93 Zach 93
item.description:
@Zach_93 wrote:

public void triggerTele(int x, int y, int height,) {
	if (System.currentTimeMillis() - lastAction > 5000) {
		lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis();
		resetWalkingQueue();
		if (duelStatus == 3) {
			return;
		}
		tX = x;
		tY = y;
		tH = height;
		tStage = 1;
		tTime = 0;
	        stillgfx(392, absY, absX);
	}
}

Read full topic

Hmm… it’s odd. Whenever I add that, I get the ol’ 100 errors when I compile, even though the brackets are equal?

item.title: Tele Delay?
item.dc:creator: @guitars595 guitars595
item.description:
@guitars595 wrote:

public void triggerTele(int x, int y, int height,) { if (System.currentTimeMillis() - lastAction > 5000) { lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis(); resetWalkingQueue(); if (duelStatus == 3) return; tX = x; tY = y; tH = height; tStage = 1; tTime = 0; stillgfx(392, absY, absX); } }
Then use it as triggerTele(XXXX, YYYY, HEIGHT);

Read full topic
